2.0.0.name: connect20/Vgroup_Backupdel
2.0.0.description: Extension automatically deletes backups created by Magento backup tool. It keeps backup for selected days only.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

1.9.2.1.name: connect20/Vgroup_Backupdel
1.9.2.1.description: This extension help you to automatic delete your old backup created by system by keeping selected days backup.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
